Action.author: binhn
Action.body: I am not sure what you are trying to do and which service locks up?

Action.author: jimthematrix
Action.body: thanks for reporting the issue. At this point we are not touching HFC 0.6.x, all development efforts focused on v1.0 (fabric-client and fabric-ca-client in npm). if you want to contribute a fix we can consider reviewing and publishing it. in that case please re-open and assign to yourself.
